name: Farkle HD Addict-ion - FREE Dice Blitz Game
name_original: Farkle HD Addict-ion - FREE Dice Blitz Game
description:
***DON'T FARKLE***

***CAN YOU SCORE 10,000 POINTS?***

The best dice game is now on your phone! Become a farkle addict by testing your luck and skills to get the top score. Now with multiplayer!

Players begin with rolling 6 dice. Collect 3 of a kinds, straights, triplets and more to score the highest. If you can't collect any dice then you FARKLE! The highest score after 1- rounds wins! Play with others and test their limits.

Fun graphics and sounds for intense gameplay. Play multi[layer or against the CPU.
